name: Smithy
description: Smithy is an underground rodent that happens to be an excellent weapons smith. Purchase and upgrade weapons while destroying everything standing in your way to collect more gold!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
